name: Random

inputs.name: Min
inputs.description: The minimum value (included) of the generated random number; if the minimum value is larger than maximum value, the minimum value becomes the maximum value

inputs.name: Max
inputs.description: The maximum value (not included) of the generated random number; if the maximum value is smaller than minimum value, the maximum value becomes the minimum value

outputs.name: Result
outputs.description: The random number generated between Min and Max

description: Generate a random number within a certain range.
